name: Miura style - Berserk - LORA
description:
Both loras trained on nai. Good results with 0.8-1 weigths.

No prompt necessary but "traditional media" is good.
Very versatile Lora, good for portrait, eldritch monster, landscape, etc.

Miura05 is trained on a fullset artwork (including multiple characters pictures)
Miura08 is trained on a pruned set (only kept portrait, fighting scene and landscape.)

Preview are the same seed/prompt for Miura05 and 08 for easy comparison.

Curb your expectations, these loras are not perfect.
Miura's art style is too unique to fully capture.

Try both and pick your favorite !

Reviews are really appreciated, i love to see the community use my work, that's why I share it.
If you like my work, you can tip me here.

Got a specific request ? I'm open for commission on my fiverr gig *! If you provide enough data, OCs are accepted

*Any paid request will not be presented on this page, unless you give me permission to.
